commits.message:
EUCA-12856 - low level eucalyptus-node logs are showing up in the system journal

Description:
 - A call to stat_backing_store() is being made before the blobstore logging system is initialized.

Changes:
 - Add a function to set the error function for the blobstore to backing:bs_errors()
 - init_backing_errors() is called before stat_backing_store() calls so that logging (at TRACE) will go to nc.log

Testing:
 - Tested manually to verify that the journal is no longer filled with the trace output.
 - Verfied that logging is still going to /var/log/eucalyptus/nc.log
